title: Seijitsuna Sagishi
sinopse:
A Spin-off story from Sabaki no Chi.

The story about Biskyu Cris's master, a cat born from Shell Rock (a ancient stone that has a soul within it) and his master, Roswell, a witch.

They later would show in Mitsuyaku no Chi, a sequel of Sabaki no Chi

(Source: MU)
